name: Dexterity
description: Multiplied by threeeeeeeee

name: Dual Magma Blade build
description: Dual Magma Blade build that has an ash of war for the main damage, as well as the light attacks at close combat to deal large amounts of fire damage. This could also be a counter attack playstyle using the inherent magma blade.

name: Icerind Hatchet build
description: Icerind Hatchet main way of dealing damage is the Hoarfrost stomp ash of war as well as its base moveset to maximise the cold attunement. The combat style is versatile as it can range from medium to close range.

name: Dual Icerind Hatchet build
description: Dual Icerind Hatchet that does pure physical damage depending on what ash of is in use, has a good moveset for close quarter combat that can deal frost damage, but also another playstyle would be jump attacks especially with the claw talisman. This weapon scales with dexterity to further increase the damage.

name: Stormhawk Axe build
description: The Stormhawk Axe weapon scales well with strength and dexterity. It requires a medium to close range counter attack combat style especialy with its unique ash of war thunderstorm. This should be used alongside the heavy attacks to punish large windows that more dangerous oponents will have. Buffs like Golden Vow should be used to aid the user in combat.

name: Black Bow build
description: The Black Bow needs a long to medium range user to deal sufficient damage use the quick attacks as well as the ash of war barrage. The user should also utilise bleed and poison build up if possible to get extra damage. The golden vow buff will increase defense and attack. Arrow's Sting talismans will increase the damage of every arrow to aid the barrage of attacks.

name: Black Bow and Serpent Bow build
description: The Black Bow & Serpent Bow are used to build up both bleed and poison. Poison arrows won't need to be used as that is inherent on the Serpent Bow. It uses a long to medium range combat style with a very quick ash of war barrage and the user should use the quick attacks on the black bow to maximise damage. The user should maintain distance as much as possible to avoid damage and to increase survivability. The user should scale in dexxterity and faith to increase the status effect damage.

name: Hookclaws build
description: The Hookclaws weapon is a short range rapid damage dealer. This weapon can do quick successive attacks especially when two-handed speeding up the blood bleed damage. Bloodflame blade should be utilised to increase the bleed damage as well as the lord of blood's exultaition. Alongside the quick attack playstyle, jump attacks could also become the main source of damage especially with the added damage through the claw talisman. The white mask is used again to increase the bleed damage. Thr Rotten Winged sword talisman is to increase the successive attack damage.

name: Greatsword (Gut's sword) build
description: Guts Greatsword has high poise damage that can be from the heavy attacks and the ash of war lion's claw, this means the user has to play a close combat style. Jump attacks can also be mixed in for the claw talisman damage increase and poise.

name: Greatsword (Gut's sword) and Bloodstained Dagger build
description: Guts Greatsword and Bloodstained dagger need a full close combat playstyle, that leads with charged heavies and the lion's claw ash of war, while the dagger is a backup weapon for quick attack punishes. The greatsword heavily scales with strength, and is suggested to have high endurance and vigor beside it. Jump attacks, charged heavy attacks, and lion's claw attacks all deal large amounts of poise damage allowing the user to get many riposts to deal extra damage.

name: Maliketh's Black Blade build
description: Maliketh's Black Blade scales with strength, dex and faith. The playstyle should consist of close to medium range combat. The user should apply destined death first to the opponent after buffs, and then follow with jump attacks and so on.

name: Maliketh's Black Blade & Black Knife build
description: Maliketh's Black Blade & Black Knife weapons are both used to apply destined death upon the opponent, followed by jump and heavy attacks from black blade and quick attack from the black knife. These weapons can be played both in a medium to close combat playstyle. Another option is to use the seal to use the incantation of black blade to deal extra damage with destined death. These weapons scale with strength, dex and faith.

name: Zweihander build
description: Zweihander is a greatsword that scales heavily on strength. With heavy charged attacks and the giant crusher ash of war large amounts of damage can be produced. Points into endurance and vigor is suggested.

name: Starscourge Greatsword
description: The Starscourge Greatsword weapon scales strength, dex and intelligence. The starcaller cry ash of war should be utilised to do gravity magic damage, as well as using the greatsword as a two-handed weapon to have two greatswords that do good poise damage. Jump attacks should be used when possible or when counter attacking in its close combat playstyle.

name: Grafted Blade Greatsword build
description: Grafted Blade Greatsword requires high amounts of strength, endurance and vigor. This weapon has very high poise damage that can be built up by charged heavy attacks and jump attacks for a close combat playstyle. Before fights begin the user is suggested to use 4 buffs consisting of flame, grant me strength, golden vow, commander o neil's weapon ash of war, and the main weapon grafted blade greatsword ash of war.

name: Prelate's Inferno Crozier build
description: Prelate's Inferno Crozier scales with strength, dex, and intelligence. Using charged heavies and the ash of war it can lead to good poise damage and very high fire damage. It is recommended to use the buffs of flame, grant me strenght and the commader o neil's weapon ash of war to increase physical damage.

name: Ghiza's Wheel build
description: Ghiza's Wheel requires large amounts of strength and dexterity scaling. Buffs should be applied for extra endurance and physical damage. A close combat style will be used as well as counter-attacks to punish enemies. The source of damage will be done by the ash of war, charged heavies and jump attacks. These will do great physical damage and poise damage.

name: Giant Crusher build
description: Giant Crusher weapon requires high levels in strength, endurance and vigor. The combat style will consist of jump attacks, charged heavies, and finally the ash of war lion's claw. These will do high amounts of poise and physical damage along with the added damage from the buffs.

name: Rotten Greataxe build
description: Rotten Greataxe requires high amounts of strength, dexterity, and vigor. Combat style will consist of close range punishment and attacks. These will be the ash of wars and charged heavies. Jump attacks can also be introduced to deal as much rotten and apply bleed as well.

name: Dual Bandit's Curved Sword build
description: Dual Bandit's Curved Sword scales off dexterity and strength. The user's playstyle should consist of close-quater jump and quick attacks for quick successive damage and rapid bleed build up. To get extra bleed the user can use the ash of war seppuku or the bloodflame blade incantation, and the buffs can boost the stamina and damage.

name: Magma Blade build
description: Magma Blade has its own unique ash of war which is the Magma Shower. This is a fact skill that does physical and fire damage. It also leaves a small area of magma on the ground to keep dealing fire damage and stance damage to the opponent. Majority of the combat will be close combat and punishing the opponents large open windows with the ash of war.

name: Wing of Astel build
description: Wing of Astel is meant for close combat, utilised well with its Nebula ash of war. This ash of war can be against many foes and large opponents to deal stance and magic damage.

name: Wing of Astel build
description: The Wing of Astel build emphasizes a combination of melee and ranged magic attacks. Use the charged heavy attacks for their projectile attacks to chip away at enemies or exploit their weaknesses from a distance. Utilize Nebula to dispatch groups of enemies, inflict high stance damage on larger foes, or burst down bosses when they are vulnerable. Buff up with Terra Magica before engaging in critical moments, and use Carian Slicer for quick, close-range damage bursts. Consider dual-wielding curved swords, like another Wing of Astel or a Magic-infused Bandit's Curved Sword, for even higher melee damage output.

name: Scavenger's Curved Sword build
description: The focus is on aggressive attacks with dual curved swords to rapidly inflict bleeding. The Scavenger's Curved Sword excels at chaining hits, maximizing the benefits of talismans such as the Rotten Winged Sword Insignia and Millicent's Prosthesis. Initiate engagements with jump attacks, enhanced by the Claw Talisman, to immediately inflict damage and begin building bleed. When facing tougher enemies or those resistant to bleed, use the Seppuku Ash of War on both swords for a boost to bleed build-up and damage output. Manage health carefully, as Seppuku consumes HP. Utilize the Flask of Wondrous Physick before intense battles for temporary boosts in damage or poise. Consider Incantations such as Bloodflame Blade to further increase bleed build-up, or Dragon Communion Incantations for supplemental damage and crowd control, adapting strategy to the enemy or situation.

name: Eclipse Shotel build
description: The Eclipse Shotel combines melee combat with the Death Flare weapon art. Engage in close-quarters combat using the curved sword's fast attack speed. This allows you to chain hits to maximize the effects of talismans that boost damage on successive strikes. The weapon's design allows it to bypass a portion of enemy shield defenses, making it effective against guarded foes. Utilize the Death Flare skill to inflict Death Blight buildup on opponents, particularly in PvP, where it can lead to instant death. Against enemies immune to Death Blight, the explosion from Death Flare still provides solid damage and stance breaking potential. Before engaging in difficult encounters, empower yourself with Incantation buffs like Golden Vow and Flame, Grant Me Strength, and activate your Flask of Wondrous Physick for added damage and survivability. Adapt your approach based on the enemy: exploit Death Blight buildup against Tarnished opponents, or leverage the holy damage and explosive power of Death Flare against other foes.

name: Scimitar build
description: Employ the Scimitar's rapid attack speed to deliver a flurry of blows, particularly when dual-wielding, to quickly inflict damage and apply status effects like bleeding or poison. The fast attack chains benefit greatly from talismans that boost damage with successive hits. Utilize jump attacks, enhanced by the Claw Talisman, as a primary opener to close distances and initiate offense. Experiment with different Ashes of War like Spinning Slash for aggressive engagements or Bloodhound's Step for evasive maneuvers and advantageous positioning. When facing challenging enemies or bosses, consider using temporary boosts from the Flask of Wondrous Physick and Incantation buffs like Golden Vow for increased damage and durability. Adapt your strategy to the enemy type, focusing on bleed buildup for susceptible foes or prioritizing raw physical damage against those resistant to status effects. Be mindful of stamina management, especially when power stancing, to avoid being caught off guard.

name: Bloodhound's Fang build
description: The Bloodhound's Fang build excels through a combination of melee strikes, the weapon's special skill, and Incantation buffs. Begin by empowering the weapon with Bloodflame Blade, adding fire damage and boosting bleed buildup, which synergizes with the Fang's innate bleed effect. Engage opponents with standard attacks and charged attacks, particularly the powerful second R2 which can be a great finisher. Leverage the Bloodhound's Finesse skill for both offensive and defensive purposes. The initial uppercut delivers significant damage, while the backward somersault provides valuable invincibility frames for dodging attacks or creating distance. Follow up with a strong attack after the initial skill to teleport towards your foe and deliver another potent strike,. Against enemies susceptible to bleed, the rapid attacks combined with Bloodflame Blade and the Lord of Blood's Exultation talisman will quickly inflict blood loss, leading to devastating damage bursts,. Utilize Flask of Wondrous Physick buffs before challenging encounters to temporarily maximize damage or defensive capabilities. Consider using jump attacks, enhanced by the Claw Talisman, for even greater damage potential. This build's strength lies in its aggressive melee combat combined with the strategic use of Bloodhound's Finesse for both offense and defense, allowing for adaptability in various combat scenarios.

name: Zamor Curved Sword build
description: The Zamor Curved Sword's moveset and Zamor Ice Storm weapon skill are its strengths. The light attack chain involves spinning slashes that move the player forward, suitable for aggressive engagements. The charged heavy attack's second hit is a powerful double slash. Zamor Ice Storm inflicts frostbite, dealing damage and reducing enemy defenses, according to Elden Ring Wiki. Use this skill to stagger enemies, control an area, or apply frostbite quickly. Be aware of the skill's short range and the weapon's slower swing speed. Combine the weapon's attacks with jump attacks, especially when dual-wielding, to maximize damage and utilize the Claw Talisman's boost. Consider using the Bloodhound's Fang alongside the Zamor Curved Sword for both bleed and frost buildup, or focus solely on a Dex/Quality build for strong physical damage. Before challenging encounters, activate your Flask of Wondrous Physick and use Incantation buffs to enhance your damage output and survivability. Choose your strategy based on the enemy type, leveraging the frostbite against vulnerable foes or relying on raw damage and the weapon's unique moveset for others.

name: Monk's Flame Sword build
description: The Monk's Flameblade's strength lies in its base damage, Dexterity scaling, and versatile Ash of War. Begin by using Flask of Wondrous Physick and Incantation buffs like Golden Vow or Flame, Grant Me Strength. Use standard attacks, jump attacks, and the chosen Ash of War. For example, use Spinning Slash to engage multiple foes or inflict significant damage. Against fire-vulnerable enemies, infuse the weapon with a Fire affinity and utilize Incantations like Black Flame or Bloodflame Blade to maximize damage output. Maintain a medium distance combat style.

name: Dual Monk's Flame Sword build
description: The Monk's Flameblade's strength lies in its base damage, Dexterity scaling, and versatile Ash of War. Begin by using Flask of Wondrous Physick and Incantation buffs like Golden Vow or Flame, Grant Me Strength. Use standard attacks, jump attacks, and the chosen Ash of War. For example, use Spinning Slash to engage multiple foes or inflict significant damage. Against fire-vulnerable enemies, infuse the weapon with a Fire affinity and utilize Incantations like Black Flame or Bloodflame Blade to maximize damage output. Maintain a medium equip load for nimble movement and effective dodging in combat for an aggressive combat style.

name: Morgott's Curved Sword build
description: This build focuses on aggressive melee combat and strategic weapon skill use. Incantation buffs, such as Golden Vow and Flame, Grant Me Strength, increase offense and defense. The Flask of Wondrous Physick provides temporary boosts. Engage enemies with standard sword attacks, utilizing speed and range. The moveset, including wide sweeping light and running attacks, is effective against multiple enemies. The charged heavy attack can also be used for roll catches. Use the Cursed-Blood Slice skill in attack rotations to stagger enemies, with the fire explosion contributing to bleed buildup. This skill's hyper armor enables confident hit trading. The Lord of Blood's Exultation talisman provides a significant attack boost when triggering hemorrhage. Frenzied Burst can be used for high single-target damage against distant or evasive foes, even penetrating shields. Prioritize the fire damage from Cursed-Blood Slice against enemies vulnerable to fire. Tailor the strategy based on the enemy: exploit bleed vulnerabilities or rely on raw damage output and the moveset's versatility for other encounters.

name: Black Knife build
description: This build combines fast melee attacks with the unique effects of the Black Knife and Incantations. Increase offense and defense by using buffs like Golden Vow and Flame, Grant Me Strength. Activating your Flask of Wondrous Physick adds temporary boosts. Engage enemies with quick standard dagger attacks and charged heavy attacks to maximize talisman benefits. The Black Knife's Blade of Death skill is crucial. It launches a holy projectile that damages enemies and reduces their maximum HP for a period. Combining Blade of Death with the Black Blade Incantation can stack health-reducing debuffs for even greater boss damage. Consider switching to an off-hand Erdsteel Dagger with a different damage type or focusing more on Incantations like Black Flame for enemies resistant to holy damage. Using the Black Knife in the off-hand while wielding a weapon with a high critical rating like the Misericorde in the main hand can be beneficial against opponents vulnerable to critical hits. Manage FP effectively to ensure frequent use of Blade of Death and Incantations, potentially using FP-restoring talismans or Flask charges. Adapting weapon and Incantation choices based on enemy type and resistances is key to success.

name: Dual Black Knife build
description: This build combines fast melee attacks with the unique effects of the Black Knife and Incantations. name: Misericorde build
description: The Misericorde build focuses on exploiting the high critical damage. Buffs like Golden Vow and Flame, Grant Me Strength, along with the Flask of Wondrous Physick, further increase critical damage. The Misericorde's light attacks can be used to chip away at enemies while awaiting parry or stance-break chances. Infusing the Misericorde with an elemental affinity, such as Fire or Lightning, allows criticals to bypass normal split damage resistance thresholds. This may increase critical damage more effectively than a pure physical infusion, particularly at lower levels.

name: Misericorde build
description: The Misericorde build focuses on exploiting the dagger's high critical damage. Parrying attacks with a shield opens enemies for a critical strike. Alternatively, break their stance with a strong Ash of War from a secondary weapon, such as Flame of the Redmanes. Buffs like Golden Vow and Flame, Grant Me Strength, along with the Flask of Wondrous Physick, further increase critical damage. The Misericorde's light attacks can be used to chip away at enemies while awaiting parry or stance-break chances. Infusing the Misericorde with an elemental affinity, such as Fire or Lightning, allows criticals to bypass normal split damage resistance thresholds. This may increase critical damage more effectively than a pure physical infusion, particularly at lower levels.

name: Reduvia build
description: This approach uses the Reduvia's speed and bleed effect, along with the Blood Blade skill. Focus on swift strikes to build up bleed. The Blood Blade projectile can initiate bleed buildup from a safe distance or add extra damage and buildup at close range. For enemies resistant to bleed, use the dagger's physical damage output. Maintaining a moderate FP pool for frequent Blood Blade use is important. Consider Incantation buffs like Golden Vow or Bloodflame Blade to further enhance damage and bleed effects, especially against tougher enemies.

name: Dual Reduvia build
description: Power stancing two Reduvias significantly increases the speed of bleed buildup, as each strike from both daggers contributes to the bleed meter. This is an aggressive playstyle that aims to quickly trigger hemorrhage. Use rapid L1 attacks and jump attacks, capitalizing on talismans like the Rotten Winged Sword Insignia for increased damage with successive hits. While having two Reduvias allows for more rapid attacks, the Blood Blade skill's effectiveness doesn't double simply by having two daggers. However, the sheer number of hits when dual wielding will lead to more bleed procs overall. Be mindful of stamina consumption when dual wielding, as the increased attack speed can quickly deplete it. Buff with Incantations and the Flask of Wondrous Physick before engaging in critical moments to maximize the damage potential of this aggressive build.

name: Wakizashi build
description: This approach leverages the Wakizashi's speed, bleed buildup, and chosen Ash of War. Focus on rapid strikes and Quickstep for evasion and setting up attacks. Apply Incantation buffs like Golden Vow for increased damage and defense. Conserve FP for the chosen Ash of War. Utilize the Wakizashi's ability to be buffed by Magic or consumables to further enhance its damage output, depending on the enemy's weaknesses.

name: Dual Wakizashi build
description: Power stancing two Wakizashis offers a flurry of attacks, rapidly building up bleed on susceptible enemies. Focus on chaining L1 attacks and jump attacks to maximize the benefit of successive attack talismans like the Rotten Winged Sword Insignia. Be mindful of stamina consumption when dual wielding, as the increased attack speed can deplete it quickly. Before engaging in critical moments, enhance damage output and survivability using Incantation buffs and the Flask of Wondrous Physick. Remember that the power-stance moveset of two Wakizashis is slower than the normal dagger moveset, according to Elden Ring Wiki.

name: Wakizashi & Uchigatana build
description: This setup provides the katana power stance moveset, which includes powerful wide swings, while retaining the benefits of the Wakizashi in the left hand. Parry can be equipped on the Wakizashi for parrying opportunities or Quickstep for evasion. This hybrid approach allows for aggressive melee combat with the katana's reach and moveset, complemented by the utility and low weight of the Wakizashi. Utilize the katana's Ash of War for stance breaks or area control, and consider jump attacks to take advantage of the combined damage of both weapons. Buff with Incantations like Golden Vow for added power.

name: Cinquedea build
description: This approach uses the Cinquedea's high base damage and Strength scaling for close-quarters combat. Use standard dagger attacks and Quickstep to position for optimal hits and evade incoming attacks. The main damage output comes from the Cinquedea's physical damage, supported by buffs like Golden Vow or Flame, Grant Me Strength, and Flask of Wondrous Physick charges. Bestial Incantations like Beastial Sling can be used for quick ranged attacks or for breaking enemy poise. Using Bestial Vitality provides a passive heal. The Cinquedea's quick attacks complement the swiftness of Beastial Sling.

name: Dual Cinquedea build
description: While this doesn't provide a specialized powerstance moveset, dual wielding Cinquedeas offers faster attacks than a single dagger, leading to higher damage output over time. This approach capitalizes on the damage bonus provided by using two Cinquedeas and the high attack speed of dual daggers. The focus is on aggressive melee combat, using standard attacks and jump attacks to inflict damage rapidly. Buffs like Golden Vow and Flame, Grant Me Strength further enhance the physical damage. Bestial Incantations like Beastial Sling can still be integrated into this playstyle for ranged attacks and poise damage. Manage stamina carefully when dual wielding, as the increased attack speed can deplete it quickly. Before critical engagements, use Incantation buffs and the Flask of Wondrous Physick to maximize damage and survivability.

name: Grafted Dragon build
description: This build relies on the Grafted Dragon's strong physical and fire damage, along with the Bear Witness! skill. Focus on charging heavy attacks for high stance damage, which can open enemies for critical strikes or a devastating Bear Witness! attack. According to Reddit, these attacks are swift and hard-hitting. The Ash of War, Bear Witness!, is effective against large enemies and groups because of its wide area of effect and lingering flames. Manage FP carefully to ensure frequent use of Bear Witness! against challenging enemies. Before engaging, enhance offense and defense with Incantation buffs like Golden Vow or Flame, Grant Me Strength, and Flask of Wondrous Physick charges. A shield can supplement this build for defense, particularly against agile or heavily-hitting opponents.

name: Two Handing Iron Balls build
description: This aggressive style involves power-stancing two Iron Balls to deliver a rapid barrage of heavy attacks. The focus is on overwhelming enemies with sustained damage and quickly breaking their stance. Charged heavy attacks, especially with two weapons, can be highly effective. The Rotten Winged Sword Insignia or Millicent's Prosthesis further boosts damage with the consecutive hits from dual wielding. However, stamina management is crucial, as the aggressive attack patterns consume it quickly. Utilize the Bull-Goat's Talisman for increased poise during attacks, allowing you to trade hits more effectively. Use buffs and Flask of Wondrous Physick charges strategically before engaging in combat to maximize damage output

name: Two Handing Star Fist build
description: This build uses an aggressive dual-wielding combat style, utilizing the Star Fists' innate bleed and high Strength scaling for rapid damage and stance breaking. The faster power-stance moveset should be used, particularly against bosses, to quickly break their posture and inflict hemorrhage. Charged heavy attacks, especially when dual wielding, are very effective for damage and stance breaking. Talismans like the Rotten Winged Sword Insignia boost damage with consecutive hits. Use Incantation buffs such as Golden Vow or Flame, Grant Me Strength before critical moments to maximize damage output. Manage stamina carefully, as the aggressive attack patterns will deplete it quickly, and consider using the Bull-Goat's Talisman for increased poise during attacks. Adapt the strategy based on enemy type and resistance to physical and bleed damage.

name: Chainlink Flail build
description: This approach utilizes the Chainlink Flail's raw physical damage, enhanced by Strength scaling and charged heavy attacks. Buff with Incantations like Golden Vow and Flame, Grant Me Strength, and activate the Flask of Wondrous Physick to maximize damage. Use charged heavy attacks to break enemy stance, taking advantage of the Axe Talisman. The chosen Ash of War, such as Cragblade or Barbaric Roar, should be integrated into the attack pattern to boost damage, stance breaking, or provide hyper armor for trading hits. Adapt to the situation, using the flail's strike damage against enemies resistant to slash or pierce attacks.

name: Dual Chainlink Flail build
description: Dual wielding Chainlink Flails is an aggressive strategy for fast and consistent damage. Prioritize the quick L1 attacks and jump attacks, especially when power stancing, to build up bleed and capitalize on the damage boost from successive hit talismans. Be mindful of stamina management due to the fast attacks. Buff with Incantations like Golden Vow for increased damage and survivability. Consider using jump attacks and the Claw Talisman for burst damage, as dual wielding attacks are consecutive and not simultaneous. Ensure enough poise to avoid interruption during attacks.

name: Glintstone Staff build
description: The Azur's Glintstone Staff build focuses on maximizing casting speed to unleash a constant stream of sorceries, prioritizing offensive pressure over raw damage per cast. The trade-off is higher FP consumption, which is managed through a higher Mind stat, talismans like the Radagon Icon (providing virtual Dexterity to cap casting speed), and the Cerulean Hidden Tear for temporary infinite FP bursts, crucial for spells like Comet Azur. While Azur's Staff doesn't specifically boost any school of sorcery, its speed benefit is ideal for high-damage spells and for maintaining pressure in both PvE and PvP. The Elden Ring Wiki indicates that the 40 virtual Dexterity provided by Azur's staff means you don't need to invest as many points into Dexterity to reach the casting speed cap.

name: Carian Regal Sceptor build
description: This build leverages the Carian Regal Scepter's high Intelligence scaling and passive boost to Moon sorceries to inflict significant damage, especially with spells like Rennala's Full Moon and Ranni's Dark Moon. The focus is on maximizing sorcery damage through high Intelligence and supportive talismans like the Magic Scorpion Charm and Graven-Mass Talisman. While the staff doesn't boost casting speed like Azur's, the Radagon Icon can compensate. The Carian Regal Scepter's strengths lie in its high damage potential and reliability as a primary casting tool for Intelligence builds. The Elden Ring Wiki notes that the staff provides a 10% boost to Moon sorceries.

name: Carian Regal Sceptor & Meteorite Staff build
description: This approach maximizes sorcery damage and adaptability by pairing the Carian Regal Scepter with a secondary staff. While the Carian Regal Scepter remains the primary casting tool for its superior overall scaling, the off-hand staff provides a passive damage bonus to specific spell types: Carian Sword sorceries with the Carian Glintstone Staff, or Gravity spells with the Meteorite Staff. This allows for a wider array of high-damage spells without needing to constantly re-equip your primary staff, offering greater strategic flexibility in combat. The ability to passively buff specific schools of magic in the off-hand allows the primary staff to maintain its high scaling for all other sorceries. Reddit users confirm that buffs from the off-hand staff apply when casting with the main hand.

name: Meteorite Staff build
description: Focus on maintaining distance while using sorceries. Prioritize Rock Sling against magic-resistant foes. Utilize Collapsing Stars or Gravity Well for tactical enemy manipulation. Use buffs like Golden Vow and Flame, Grant Me Strength, along with the Flask of Wondrous Physick's buffs, for burst damage against tougher enemies. Rock Sling is boosted by the Meteorite Staff. Mastering charged spells and using Terra Magica strategically will maximize damage output.

name: Meteorite Staff & Carian Regal Sceptor build
description: In the dual-wielding approach, the upgraded staff in the main hand (like the Carian Regal Scepter) becomes the primary casting tool for its superior scaling, while the Meteorite Staff in the off-hand provides a passive 30% boost to gravity sorceries. This means you'll still get a damage increase when casting gravity spells like Rock Sling, Collapsing Stars, Gravity Well, and Meteorite or Meteorite of Astel, even if not using the Meteorite staff to cast. To further optimize damage for specific situations, swap out the off-hand Meteorite Staff for another staff that buffs a different school of magic.

name: Greataxe build
description: Engage in close-quarters combat, utilizing the Greataxe's potent attacks and the Lion's Claw Ash of War to stagger and punish enemies. Focus on charged heavy attacks and jumping attacks to deal maximum damage and break enemy stance. Remember to two-hand the Greataxe to gain a 50% Strength bonus, increasing damage output and meeting stat requirements more easily. Scaling primarily comes from Strength, maximizing physical damage and Weapon Skill effectiveness. Invest heavily in Vigor for survivability and Endurance to manage heavy armor and sustain attacks. Use consumable buffs strategically before engaging tough foes to further amplify damage and defensive capabilities.

name: Overwhelm enemies with a flurry of attacks, particularly jump attacks and the extended attack strings that dual-wielding provides. If using greataxes with passive effects like bleed or rot, leverage the rapid hits to build up these status effects quickly. Focus on mastering the dual-wielding attack patterns, including L1 attacks which utilize both weapons. Scaling is primarily driven by Strength, maximizing the physical damage of both Greataxes. Invest heavily in Vigor for health and Endurance to manage equip load and stamina. Strategic use of the chosen Ashes of War and consumable buffs will further enhance damage output and survivability in challenging encounters.

name: Dual Great Omenkiller greateaxe build
description: This build maximizes the Great Omenkiller Cleaver's potential by powerstancing two Heavy-infused Cleavers. It focuses on Strength scaling, aiming for 80 Strength to increase physical damage. The Omensmirk Mask provides a Strength boost and poise, while Raptor's Black Feathers amplify jumping attacks. The Claw Talisman enhances jump attacks further, and Lord of Blood's Exultation and White Mask offer attack buffs when blood loss occurs. This build utilizes the Cleaver's innate bleed and the Cragblade Ash of War. The build also includes high Vigor, Endurance for heavy armor, and Faith (25) for incantations such as Golden Vow and Flame, Grant Me Strength. The strategy involves using buffs, followed by powerstanced jump attacks, and chaining them with the Cleaver's standard attacks and Ash of War. This quickly overwhelms enemies and triggers bleed, activating damage bonuses from talismans and the White Mask.

name: Axe of Godrick build
description: The single-wielding strategy leverages the Axe of Godrick's innate Strength and Quality scaling, particularly when wielded two-handed for the 1.5x Strength multiplier, allowing for powerful heavy attacks and skills. The Shard of Alexander talisman is essential to significantly boost the damage of the "I Command Thee, Kneel!" skill, making it a potent tool for area denial and staggering, while the Axe Talisman amplifies the damage of charged heavy attacks, a core part of this weapon's moveset. High poise armor (like Lionel's or Bull-Goat sets) and the Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman ensure survivability during aggressive melee engagements. The strategy involves initiating with buffs (if applicable, such as Golden Vow), then using standard attacks and charged R2s to build damage and stagger, before unleashing "I Command Thee, Kneel!" to capitalize on openings and stun enemies, ensuring to utilize the Stonebarb Cracked Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick for enhanced poise damage and the Spiked Cracked Tear for stronger charged attacks.

name: Axe of Godrick & Rusted Anchor build
description: The dual-wielding strategy focuses on maximizing damage output through rapid, powerstanced attacks, particularly jump attacks. The Axe of Godrick is paired with another Heavy-infused Greataxe like the Rusted Anchor, chosen for its excellent Strength scaling (achieving A-scaling with Heavy infusion) and Pierce damage type. This setup shines with the Claw Talisman, which boosts jump attack damage by 15%, making these attacks highly effective for initiating combat and dealing burst damage. The Rotten Winged Sword Insignia further enhances damage output by increasing attack power with successive hits, ideal for the continuous nature of dual-wielding strikes. While "I Command Thee, Kneel!" from the Axe of Godrick remains available for AoE and stagger, the focus shifts to overwhelming enemies with a barrage of powerstanced jump attacks and sequential strikes. High Endurance (35-40) is crucial to manage the increased stamina consumption of dual-wielding and heavy armor, ensuring sustained aggression and the ability to dodge effectively, while the Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman still provides vital physical damage reduction. The Stonebarb Cracked Tear and Spiked Cracked Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick can still be utilized to enhance poise damage and, to a lesser extent, charged attacks during this highly aggressive playstyle.

name: Rusted Anchor build
description: The single-wielding strategy centers on the Rusted Anchor's excellent Strength scaling. This is especially true when infused with Heavy and wielded two-handed. This maximizes damage output. The weapon's piercing damage type is key, benefiting from the Spear Talisman. This increases damage by 15% on counter-attacks, which happen frequently. The Axe Talisman enhances charged heavy attacks, while Braggart's Roar buffs overall attack and modifies R2 attacks into powerful combos. This strategy emphasizes landing heavy and counter-attacks, using high poise armor, such as the Lionel's or Bull-Goat sets. Also, potential buffs like Golden Vow or Flame, Grant Me Strength, if Faith is used, can help. The Flask of Wondrous Physick with Stonebarb Cracked Tear and Spiked Cracked Tear amplifies poise damage and charged attacks. The strategic gameplay involves setting up buffs, engaging with strong attacks, timing for counter-hits, and trading blows confidently due to high poise.

name: Dual Rusted Anchor build
description: The dual-wielding approach uses two Rusted Anchors for maximum offensive pressure and damage output, especially through jump attacks. Both axes primarily scale with Strength, making high investment in this stat crucial. The Claw Talisman is vital, boosting jump attack damage by 15%, turning powerstanced jump attacks into devastating openers. The Rotten Winged Sword Insignia increases attack power with successive hits. While the weapon's default skill, Barbaric Roar, can be used to buff damage, incorporating Ashes of War like Cragblade or Wild Strikes on both weapons further diversifies offensive options. High Endurance is necessary to manage the equip load of two heavy weapons. The Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman provides physical damage reduction to facilitate trading blows. This strategy emphasizes constant aggression, initiating with powerful jump attacks, followed by chains of powerstanced attacks to build up damage quickly.

name: Winged Greathorn build
description: The single-wielding strategy focuses on the Winged Greathorn's unique strengths, primarily its Strength and Dexterity scaling. It performs best with high investment in these stats. The "Soul Stifler" skill, boosted by the Shard of Alexander talisman, is a key tool, allowing you to debuff enemies by temporarily reducing their defense, making them more susceptible to your attacks. Combining this with the increased damage from charged attacks (buffed by the Axe Talisman), allows for heavy burst damage. Maintaining high poise with heavy armor, like Lionel's or Bull-Goat sets, allows you to withstand hits while delivering powerful blows. The Ritual Sword Talisman rewards playing at full HP, encouraging careful engagement and evasion. The strategic flow involves initiating with "Soul Stifler" to weaken enemies, followed by a series of two-handed heavy and charged attacks to maximize damage, potentially incorporating buffs like Golden Vow if Faith is incorporated into the build. The Stonebarb Cracked Tear further aids in breaking enemy stances.

name: Dual Winged Greathorn build
description: The dual-wielding strategy for the Winged Greathorn emphasizes aggressive, continuous damage output through powerstanced attacks. High Strength and Dexterity are crucial for maximizing the damage of both axes. The core offensive revolves around powerstanced jump attacks, significantly enhanced by the Claw Talisman. These attacks deal high damage and quickly build up enemy stance. According to TheGamer, powerstancing weapons of the same class allows for devastating attack combinations. Successive hits activate the Rotten Winged Sword Insignia, further boosting attack power and making sustained offense incredibly effective. High Endurance is essential for managing the increased stamina cost of dual-wielding heavy weapons and wearing heavy armor. The Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman helps absorb physical damage while trading blows. The Shard of Alexander will still boost the single "Soul Stifler" skill available. This strategy focuses on relentless pressure and quickly overwhelming enemies with a barrage of powerstanced attacks and jump attacks, constantly triggering damage bonuses.

name: Butchering Knife build
description: The single-wielding strategy for the Butchering Knife centers on maximizing its Dexterity scaling and exploiting its unique passive healing effect. Infusing the weapon with Keen affinity ensures optimal scaling. The strategy involves using the chosen Ash of War, such as Barbaric Roar (or others like Wild Strikes), which can be significantly boosted by the Shard of Alexander talisman, allowing for more potent attacks and more frequent hits to proc the healing. High poise armor, like Lionel's or Bull-Goat sets, is vital to absorb hits and avoid interruptions during attacks. The Winged Sword Insignia further encourages aggressive play by increasing damage with successive hits, amplifying the healing and damage output. The Godfrey Icon will boost the charged attacks while the Green Turtle Talisman aids in stamina recovery. The Flask of Wondrous Physick's Thorny Cracked Tear and Opaline Bubbletear respectively enhance successive attack damage and provide a crucial layer of defense. The core combat flow involves applying buffs (if using Faith for buffs like Golden Vow), then engaging aggressively, using a mix of standard attacks, charged attacks, and the chosen Ash of War to continually hit the enemy and regenerate health while dealing damage.

name: Dual Butchering Knife build
description: The dual-wielding strategy aims to maximize the Butchering Knife's healing and damage output through relentless, powerstanced attacks, particularly jump attacks. Both axes are Keen infused to benefit from high Dexterity scaling. The Claw Talisman is a cornerstone of this build, boosting jump attack damage by 15%, making these attacks devastating for initiating combat and dealing burst damage. Constant, rapid attacks are also crucial to activate the Rotten Winged Sword Insignia, which increases attack power with successive hits, providing a continuous damage boost. High Endurance is essential for managing the increased stamina cost of dual-wielding heavy weapons and wearing heavy armor. The Great-Jar's Arsenal can alleviate equip load concerns, while the Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman offers physical damage reduction for trading blows effectively. The Shard of Alexander will still boost the chosen Ash of War on the main hand. This strategy emphasizes aggressive offense, using jump attacks to initiate, followed by chains of powerstanced attacks to continuously hit enemies, dealing damage, triggering healing, and maximizing the successive attack bonus from the talismans. Maintaining stamina for attacking and dodging is key to this high-pressure playstyle.

name: Gargoyle's Black Axe build
description: The single-wielding strategy centers on the Gargoyle's Black Axe's combination of Physical and Holy damage, primarily scaling with Strength and Faith. High investment in these stats maximizes the weapon's damage output, especially when wielded two-handed. The War Cry weapon skill, boosted by the Shard of Alexander talisman, is a key component, increasing attack power and modifying strong attacks into potent charging attacks. High poise armor, such as Lionel's or Bull-Goat sets, is crucial for withstanding enemy attacks during these animations. Further boosting the holy damage output is the Sacred Scorpion Charm, and the Ritual Sword Talisman rewards playing at full health. Gameplay involves leading with incantations like Golden Vow or Flame, Grant Me Strength (if utilizing the off-hand seal), then initiating with War Cry to activate the attack buff and altered R2s. These charging attacks, along with standard R1s, should be used to break enemy stance and deliver heavy blows. The Flask of Wondrous Physick, containing the Holy-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Stonebarb Cracked Tear, further amplifies Holy damage and aids in stance breaking.

name: Gargoyles' Black Axe & Envoy's Greathorn build
description: The dual-wielding approach focuses on overwhelming enemies with relentless powerstanced attacks and Holy damage output. High Strength and Faith investment are crucial for maximizing the damage of both Gargoyle's Black Axes. The Sacred Scorpion Charm is essential here, providing a significant boost to the Holy damage from both weapons, making each hit more impactful. The Claw Talisman is pivotal for this strategy, as it drastically increases the damage of powerstanced jump attacks, making them a primary means of initiating combat and dealing burst damage. High Endurance (35-40) is necessary to manage the stamina consumption of two heavy axes and maintain heavy armor. The Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman offers crucial physical damage negation. The Godfrey Icon can further enhance the charged attacks performed after using the War Cry skill on the main hand weapon. This strategy revolves around aggressive, continuous offense, initiating with devastating jump attacks, followed by chains of powerstanced attacks to rapidly deplete enemy health and stance, capitalizing on the boosted Holy damage and successive hit bonuses.

name: Battle Hammer build
description: The single-wielding strategy for the Battle Hammer relies heavily on its excellent Strength scaling, maximized by wielding it two-handed. The primary focus is on delivering powerful blows and exploiting enemy weaknesses through stance breaks, aided by the Stonebarb Cracked Tear. The Shard of Alexander is crucial for enhancing your chosen Ash of War, such as Lion's Claw for its high damage and poise breaking potential or Braggart's Roar for its beneficial stat buffs. The Axe Talisman further increases damage from charged attacks, which are a strong component of the Battle Hammer's moveset, according to the Elden Ring Wiki. High poise armor (like Lionel's or Bull-Goat sets) and the Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman ensure you can withstand hits and trade blows effectively. Gameplay involves leading with buffs, strategically using the Ash of War to deal burst damage or stagger, and following up with heavy and charged attacks to break enemy stances and maximize damage.

On Reddit, users discuss that while not always optimal, dual-wielding Great Hammers can be effective in breaking poise. Pairing the Bolt of Gransax with the Guardian Swordspear or Great Epee (Keen or Lightning Infused) offers strong melee options to complement the ranged attacks. name: Cross-Naginata build
description: The single-wielding Cross-Naginata strategy focuses on its unique moveset, which blends both thrusting and slashing attacks, providing excellent versatility. Infusing with Keen affinity results in B scaling in Dexterity, while Occult affinity scales bleed buildup with Arcane, Maxroll. High Dexterity (60-80) and optional Arcane investment (45-50) maximize bleed buildup and physical damage. The Lord of Blood's Exultation talisman and White Mask maximize damage after triggering bleed, while the Spear Talisman enhances thrusting counterattacks, YouTube. The Thorny Cracked Tear and Spiked Cracked Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick further enhance successive and charged attack damage, respectively.

name: Dual Cross-Naginata build
description: The dual-wielding strategy involves using two Cross-Naginatas, or one paired with another spear, to overwhelm enemies with powerstanced jump attacks and rapid bleed buildup, YouTube. High Dexterity (60-80) and Arcane (45-50, if using Occult infusion) are crucial for maximizing the damage and bleed buildup of both weapons. The Claw Talisman and Raptor's Black Feathers chest armor combine to significantly boost jump attack damage. The Rotten Winged Sword Insignia further enhances damage with successive hits. The Lord of Blood's Exultation ensures a large damage boost after triggering bleed. High Endurance (30-35) and the Great-Jar's Arsenal are essential for managing stamina drain and equip load of two weapons and armor. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs (like Seppuku on the off-hand, YouTube), initiating with jump attacks, followed by sustained powerstanced attacks, and strategically using the main hand's Ash of War, boosted by the Shard of Alexander, to capitalize on openings and stun enemies, focusing on rapidly depleting enemy health and stance while continuously dealing bleed or frostbite damage. The Thorny Cracked Tear and Stonebarb Cracked Tear further boost successive and poise damage, respectively.

name: Pike build
description: The single-wielding Pike strategy focuses on its exceptional reach, which allows for powerful thrusting attacks and safe counter-attacking. Infusing with Heavy affinity with high Strength, or Quality for balanced scaling, provides strong physical damage. Occult infusion with high Arcane can add significant damage and bleed buildup. The Spear Talisman enhances counterattack damage, capitalizing on the Pike's moveset. The Shard of Alexander and Godfrey Icon boost the chosen Ash of War. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs, utilizing the weapon's reach to poke enemies from a distance, using the Ash of War to deal heavy damage and stagger, and leveraging counterattacks when enemies commit to an attack. The Stonebarb Cracked Tear and Spiked Cracked Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick further enhance poise and charged attack damage, respectively.

name: Lordsworn's Straight Sword build
description: The single-wielding Lordsworn's Straight Sword strategy capitalizes on its high critical rating and versatility. Infusing with a Quality affinity provides balanced Strength and Dexterity scaling, resulting in high physical damage. The default Square Off skill is excellent for staggering enemies for a critical hit, and its high posture damage is especially useful against larger opponents. Using a shield with Barricade Shield allows for powerful Guard Counters, which can also lead to critical hits. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs, utilizing the weapon's balanced moveset, using Square Off or another chosen Ash of War to stagger enemies, and following up with critical hits to maximize damage. name: Broadsword build

The Stonebarb Cracked Tear and Spiked Cracked Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick further enhance poise and charged attack damage, respectively.

name: Longsword build
description: The single-wielding Longsword strategy capitalizes on its versatility, standard moveset, and powerful Ash of War, Square Off, which is excellent for staggering enemies and setting up critical hits, YouTube. A Quality build with 40-50 in Strength and Dexterity provides balanced scaling and decent physical damage. The Dagger Talisman and Godfrey Icon further boost critical and charged attack damage, respectively. Using a shield with Barricade Shield allows for powerful Guard Counters, which can also lead to critical hits. High Strength and Dexterity (40-50 in each for Quality infusion) or Intelligence/Faith/Arcane (for elemental or status builds) are crucial for maximizing the damage of both weapons. name: Sword of Night and Flame build
description: The Sword of Night and Flame is a versatile and powerful weapon for Intelligence/Faith builds. Its Night-and-Flame Stance offers both ranged and AoE attacks, making it adaptable to various combat situations. High investment in Intelligence and Faith, combined with complementary talismans and buffs, maximizes its potential for devastating damage. Strategic use of its skills and careful resource management are key to success.

name: Godskin Peeler build
description: The single-wielding Godskin Peeler strategy relies on its dexterity scaling, reach, and rapid attacks. Infusing with Keen affinity with high Dexterity (60-80) provides strong physical damage. The Rotten Winged Sword Insignia and Twinblade Talisman reward successive hits, working well with the Godskin Peeler's attack speed. The Shard of Alexander boosts the chosen Ash of War. The gameplay involves applying buffs, utilizing the weapon's moveset, especially the fast combos from skills like Double Slash, and using the Ash of War to deal heavy damage and stagger, particularly with the Black Flame Tornado skill against large enemies.

name: Dual Godskin Peeler build
description: The dual-wielding strategy uses two Godskin Peelers or one paired with Eleonora's Poleblade to overwhelm enemies with powerstanced jump attacks and rapid combos. High Arcane (45-50) and Dexterity (45-50) are crucial for maximizing the bleed buildup of both weapons when infused with Occult or Blood affinities. The Claw Talisman and Raptor's Black Feathers chest armor combine to significantly boost jump attack damage. The Lord of Blood's Exultation and White Mask provide a large damage boost after triggering bleed. Gameplay involves applying buffs (including Seppuku on both weapons), initiating with jump attacks, followed by sustained powerstanced attacks, and utilizing skills like Corpse Piler (on Eleonora's Poleblade) to capitalize on openings and bleed enemies to death.

name: Eleonora's Poleblade build
description: The single-wielding Eleonora's Poleblade strategy centers on its high bleed and fire damage potential, particularly from the Bloodblade Dance weapon skill. The weapon's moveset, which includes a fast and unique R2 attack that spins multiple times, makes it excellent for consecutive hits, triggering bonus damage from talismans like the Rotten Winged Sword Insignia and Thorny Cracked Tear, Elden Ring Wiki. High investment in Arcane and Dexterity maximizes bleed buildup and fire damage output. The Lord of Blood's Exultation talisman and White Mask provide a large damage boost after triggering bleed, which happens frequently with Bloodblade Dance. The Shard of Alexander further enhances the skill's damage, while the Carian Filigreed Crest manages its FP cost. High Vigor and Faith (for Golden Vow and Flame, Grant Me Strength) ensure survivability and additional damage. This approach is effective against bosses and single targets, where you can safely use Bloodblade Dance to shred their health and posture.

name: Dual Eleonora's Poleblade build
description: The dual-wielding strategy involves using two Eleonora's Poleblades or one paired with another twinblade to maximize powerstanced jump attacks and consecutive hits. This approach is highly aggressive and effective against most enemies and bosses. The combination of the Claw Talisman, Raptor's Black Feathers chest armor, and a high Arcane stat (45-50) makes jump attacks incredibly powerful, especially with the bonus bleed buildup from the second weapon. The Rotten Winged Sword Insignia and Lord of Blood's Exultation further amplify damage during rapid attack chains and after triggering bleed. The White Mask and Flame-Shrouding Cracked Tear also enhance damage output. While dual-wielding sacrifices the use of the main hand's Ash of War for a normal attack, the combined damage and bleed buildup from two weapons, particularly during powerstanced jump attacks, more than compensate. The Bloodblade Dance skill from the main hand remains a valuable tool for burst damage and evasive maneuvers, offering a versatile and devastating offensive playstyle. This build thrives on constant pressure and rapid status effect application, making it a fast-paced and high-damage option for PvE, though it may be more susceptible to punishment if not executed carefully in PvP. The main advantage of this strategy lies in its ability to quickly apply bleed to enemies, which can stagger them and open them up for critical hits. The high number of hits from powerstanced attacks combined with the bleed effect and fire damage makes this build very effective against bosses that are susceptible to bleed and can be staggered easily. The playstyle is fast-paced, requiring players to constantly pressure their opponents and manage their stamina effectively. Although this build is very strong in PvE, it may be less effective in PvP due to the risk of being punished for aggressive play and the potential for opponents to avoid the rapid attacks.

name: Hoslow's Petal
description: The single-wielding Hoslow's Petal Whip strategy focuses on high bleed buildup and its fast and wide attack arcs, making it excellent for applying status effects and controlling groups of enemies, YouTube. Infusing with Occult affinity with high Arcane (60-80) provides the highest damage and bleed buildup, outperforming Blood infusion, Reddit. The Lord of Blood's Exultation talisman and White Mask provide a large damage boost after triggering bleed, which happens frequently with the whip's rapid attacks. Strategic gameplay involves applying buffs (like Bloodflame Blade or Golden Vow), utilizing the weapon's reach to keep enemies at a distance, and using the Ash of War to deal with specific situations (e.g., Kick against shields, Bloodhound's Step for evasion). The Thorny Cracked Tear and Spiked Cracked Tear in the Flask of Wondrous Physick further enhance successive and charged attack damage, respectively. This build is particularly effective in PvP due to the whip's unparriable nature and its ability to catch enemies who are trying to roll away, YouTube.

name: Urumi build
description: The single-wielding Urumi strategy capitalizes on its exceptional Dexterity scaling (S with Keen infusion), unique charged R2 moveset, and long reach. This build focuses on maximizing the Urumi's physical damage, which is boosted by high Dexterity investment (80). The charged heavy attack is a key component, allowing for a heavy attack into light attack combo that rewards successive attack talismans like Rotten Winged Sword Insignia and Millicent's Prosthesis, YouTube. Using Royal Knight's Resolve on the Urumi and pairing it with the Axe Talisman and Spiked Cracked Tear can lead to massive burst damage from a charged R2, which can be further amplified by the piercing damage bonus from the Spear Talisman (as the R2 thrust deals pierce damage), YouTube. This approach is highly effective in PvP due to the Urumi's deceptive range and the difficulty opponents have in predicting the charged R2 attack, Reddit. Endure can also be used to absorb hits during the charged attack windup, allowing you to tank through attacks and land the devastating combo, YouTube.
